scriptmanager.scripts.Sequence_Analysis

Class SearchMotif

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Sequence_Analysis.SearchMotif

  • public class SearchMotif
extends java.lang.Object
    This script creates a BED coordinate file of every instance of the user-provided IUPAC motif in a user-provided genomic sequence.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    SearchMotifCLI, SearchMotifOutput, SearchMotifWindow

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchMotif(java.io.File i, java.lang.String mot, int num, java.io.File output, java.io.PrintStream ps, boolean gz)
      Initialize object with script inputs for generating the coordinates of the provided motif.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Execute script to search a genome for motifs.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchMotif

        public SearchMotif(java.io.File i,
                   java.lang.String mot,
                   int num,
                   java.io.File output,
                   java.io.PrintStream ps,
                   boolean gz)
        Initialize object with script inputs for generating the coordinates of the provided motif.
        Parameters:
        i - the reference genome sequence in FASTA-format
        mot - the IUPAC motif to search for [ATGCRYSWKMBDHVN]+
        num - the number of allowed mismatches in the motif
        output - the location to save the BED-formatted coordinates of the found motifs
        ps - where to stream the error/progress updates as the script executes
        gz - If this is true, the output file will be gzipped.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Execute script to search a genome for motifs. Print the header of each sequence (i.e. "chromosome" name) as they are procesed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
